CharacterMover2D.summary: Easily move a through simple methods.

Move.summary: Move the character by a given movement. Note that the movement is multiplied by the characters move speed.

Relative.summary: Move the character by a given movement relative to its direction. Note that the movement is multiplied by the characters move speed.
Relative.param: The movement vector. May be left unnormalized for speeding up or slowing down the character externally.
If the characters sprint boost should be added on top of the move speed.

Jump.summary: Make the character jump based on its jump height. If is not called every frame after then the character goes into fast fall.

Turn.summary: Rotate the character to face either left or right.
Turn.param: If the character should face right. Faces left otherwise.
